channel.title: Jondi & Spesh Present Total Poo
channel.description: World renowned dance DJs Jondi & Spesh of Loöq Records & Qoöl are here to help you avoid bad dance music, or "Total Poo" as they call it. The show combines the running critiques of a show like "Mystery Science Theater 3000" with the humorous yet practical dialogue of NPR's "Car Talk". Casual listeners and rabid dance music fans alike will get a good laugh at the expense of bad electronic dance music and come away armed with the knowledge they need to avoid "Total Poo".
channel.itunes:author: Jondi & Spesh
channel.itunes:subtitle: Jondi & Spesh Present Total Poo
